data.title: John C. McManus – Audio Books, Best Sellers, Author Bio
data.meta_description: Learn more about John C. McManus. Browse John C. McManus’s best-selling audiobooks and newest titles. Discover more authors you’ll love listening to on Audible.
data.text:
The Americans at D-Day

The American Experience at the Normandy Invasion

By: John C. McManus

Narrated by: Joe Barrett

Length: 13 hrs and 9 mins

Unabridged

Overall

4.5 out of 5 stars 628

4.5 out of 5 stars 564

5 out of 5 stars 556

June 6, 1944, was a pivotal moment in the history of World War II. On that day the climactic and decisive phase of the war in Europe began....

5 out of 5 stars

Great Book

D-Day Revisited: The Invasion of Normandy

By: John McManus, The Great Courses

Narrated by: John McManus

Length: 2 hrs and 48 mins

Original Recording

Overall

4.5 out of 5 stars 33

Performance

4.5 out of 5 stars 23

Story

4.5 out of 5 stars 23

World War II is the defining conflict of the 20th century, one that created a line in the sands of history dividing the pre-war and post-war eras. In this epoch-defining conflict lies another definitive moment: the invasion of a 50-mile stretch of coast in Normandy, France, on June 6, 1944.

2 out of 5 stars

Poor narration

By Carrie Sandler on 06-23-24
